job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: ltpgtWe are a diversified technologyled principal trading firm We trade our own capital at our own risk across a broad range of asset classes instruments and strategies in markets around the world As the markets have evolved over the past 25 years so have we  growing to include real estate cryptocurrencies venture capital and several industry acquisitions With nearly 1200 employees at our headquarters and six global offices we work together to solve interesting problems and capture opportunities Its a place of high expectations deep curiosity and constant collaboration with some of the smartest most passionate people you will meetampnbspltpgtltpgtAs a Junior Software Developer you will be an integral member of a small team of software and hardware developers Your team will work closely with traders to solve challenging technological problems that directly impact our business You will be mentored by experienced engineers offered continuing education opportunities and be expected to handle responsibility early on in your careerltpgtltpgtHow you will make an impactltpgtltulgtltligtWork as part of a trading desk to develop maintain and support bestinclass software systemsltligtltligtIdentify innovative solutions to complex problems and advocate for their implementation to your team by communicating your ideas in a clear and concise mannerltligtltligtDesign develop and test fullstack software systems including trading systems research tools and monitoring systemsltligtltligtWork on legacy code and greenfield development in multiple languages including Java C Ruby JavaScript Clojure and PythonltligtltligtCollaborate with traders researchers and software engineers in a closeknit team environmentltligtltulgtltpgtYou will be right at home if you haveltpgtltulgtltligtA passion for computer programming and a deep curiosity to learn and absorb new technologies quicklyltligtltligtExperience developing on Linux and familiarity with the command line and BashltligtltligtExperience doing both front and backend developmentltligtltligtExperience with testdriven developmentltligtltligtA high level of ownership and accountability reliability and strong follow throughltligtltligtA strong interest and skills in computer programming and a desire for growthltligtltulgtltpgtWe do not require familiarity with or prior experience in financial markets for this roleltpgtltpgtltpgt
